#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

using VI = vector<int>;
using VVI = vector<VI>;

int main() {
  string s;
  cin >> s;
  int n = s.size();
  VVI v(26, VI(n + 1));
  for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 26; ++j) v[j][i + 1] = v[j][i];
    ++v[s[i] - 'a'][i + 1];
  }

  int q;
  cin >> q;
  for (int i = 0; i < q; ++i) {
    int l, r;
    cin >> l >> r;
    --l;
    bool odd = false;
    int k = 0;
    for (int j = 0; j < 26; ++j) {
      int m = v[j][r] - v[j][l];
      if (m % 2 == 0) k += m;
      else {
        odd = true;
        k += m - 1;
      }
    }
    cout << k + odd << endl;
  }
}
